EmailTemplate.name: 10: Client Check In Follow Up
EmailTemplate.subject: Follow Up to my Check In Call
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
I am following up on my call to you moments ago. We had planned to connect for a check in meeting to ensure your marketing is successful this year. Please feel free to reschedule at your convenience or give me a call back to connect. We shouldn't need more than 15 minutes to connect.
*If you are unable to click the button above, please Click Here
You don't necessarily need to be at a computer for our call, but it can be helpful if you are.
If you have any questions, please contact me at any time.
Thank you,
{!User.User_Full_Name__c} Account Manager Five Star Professional {!User.Phone} {!User.Email} www.fivestarprofessional.com
